wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edwin Henry Egerton,  (8 November 1841 – 8 July 1916) was a British diplomat who was envoy to Greece and ambassador to Spain and Italy.

response: *Edwin Henry Egerton CB, Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary at Athens.

* Died: Augustin Cochin, French historian, major author on the French Revolution, killed in action during the Battle of the Somme (b. 1876); Edwin Henry Egerton, British diplomat, ambassador to Greece, Spain and Italy from 1892 to 1908 (b. 1841)
*Sir Edwin Henry Egerton, KCB, His Majesty's Minister at Athens
